last_episode_to_air.name: Punch Or Be Punched
last_episode_to_air.overview: Michael Barnett must face the consequences of his actions, and Kristine is next.

name: The Curious Case of Natalia Grace
original_name: The Curious Case of Natalia Grace
overview: This stranger-than-fiction series explores the question of whether Natalia Barnett is an exploited Ukrainian child with dwarfism or a dangerous adult masquerading as a child. Featuring exclusive bombshell interviews with members of Natalia's adoptive family, relatives, friends, legal experts, and neighbors, this docuseries offers a never-before-seen glimpse into the Barnett family, Natalia's identity, Michael Barnett's October 2022 trial, as well as key insights into new theories and evidence.

episodes.name: Meet the Barnetts
episodes.overview: The Barnett’s adoption of Natalia, an allegedly six-year-old Ukrainian Orphan, turns into a nightmare when they learn she may not be six or Ukrainian. With suspicions mounting, the Barnetts discover they may have an adult stranger in their home.

episodes.name: Orphan or Imposter?
episodes.overview: Michael Barnett reveals Natalia tried to poison and harm them as the Barnett’s own lies surface. This information leads to the question -- is there more than one villain here?

episodes.name: Nightmare Neighbor
episodes.overview: Now re-aged as an adult and living alone, Natalia wreaks havoc at her new apartment by sexually propositioning and stalking the residents. Meanwhile, the Barnett’s truly sinister side emerges as they face a social services investigation into Natalia.

episodes.name: Victim or Villain?
episodes.overview: The Barnetts, now divorced, abandon Natalia in an apartment in Lafayette, Indiana. With no food, a/c, electricity or phone, the police get involved. Despite Michael’s efforts to blame Kristine solely, his shocking confessions lead to their arrests.

episodes.name: Barnett vs. Barnett
episodes.overview: As Michael’s trial approaches, he shifts fault to Kristine and catches a break when the judge throws out any discussion of Natalia’s age during the trial.

episodes.name: Punch Or Be Punched
episodes.overview: Michael Barnett must face the consequences of his actions, and Kristine is next.
